name: Wagstaff prime
summary:
In number theory, a Wagstaff prime is a prime number of the form

  
    
      
        
          
            
              
                2
                
                  p
                
              
              +
              1
            
            3
          
        
      
    
    {\displaystyle {{2^{p}+1} \over 3}}
  

where p is an odd prime. Wagstaff primes are named after the mathematician Samuel S. Wagstaff Jr.; the prime pages credit Fran√ßois Morain for naming
